creditline: Gift of Raymond A. and Ruth A. Reister
description: primarily black; maskette with round eyes and frowning mouth with red lips and visible white teeth; alternating gold and mother-of-pearl inlays around face; raptor's head at top with wings on back, with rust red inlays on top of wings and mother-of-pearl at center of back; vertical element wrapped with gold wire and tipped in ivory at bottom
medium: Argillite, catlinite, fossilized ivory, mother-of-pearl, 10 karat and 18 karat gold
signed: incised, at bottom edge of mask: DW | 2010
title: Shaman's curling medallion
